hero.title: Prime Independent Houses for Rent in Sector 63 Gurugram
description: Sector 63 Gurugram is a fast-developing residential locality located close to Golf Course Extension Road, offering excellent connectivity and a modern living environment. People searching for a house for rent in Sector 63 Gurugram prefer this area due to its proximity to major corporate hubs, Sohna Road, Southern Peripheral Road (SPR), and NH-48. The sector is surrounded by reputed schools, hospitals, shopping complexes, cafes, and daily utility markets, making it ideal for convenient urban living.

Independent houses in Sector 63 provide spacious layouts, better privacy, and a peaceful neighborhood atmosphere compared to high-density apartments. The locality is well-suited for families, working professionals, and long-term tenants who value comfort and accessibility. Choosing a house for rent in Sector 63 Gurugram ensures a balanced lifestyle with modern infrastructure, green surroundings, and smooth connectivity to all major parts of the city.

faqs.question: Is Sector 63 Gurugram a good area to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 63 is a modern and well-connected locality with excellent infrastructure and lifestyle amenities.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 63?
faqs.answer: Independent houses ranging from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are available to suit different needs.

faqs.question: Is Sector 63 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the area has schools, hospitals, parks, and shopping options nearby, making it family-friendly.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available for rent in Sector 63?
faqs.answer: Furnished and semi-furnished houses are available depending on the property and owner preferences.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sector 63 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Rent varies based on plot size, furnishing, and exact location, but Sector 63 offers competitive rental value.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 63?
faqs.answer: Sector 63 enjoys excellent connectivity via Golf Course Extension Road, SPR, and Sohna Road.

faqs.question: Are bachelors allowed to rent houses in Sector 63?
faqs.answer: Some landlords allow bachelors, while others prefer families. This depends on individual property policies.

faqs.question: Is Sector 63 safe for tenants?
faqs.answer: Yes, the locality is considered safe with gated communities and a well-settled residential environment.
